details.name: description
details.old_value:
It would be great if whoever can do it could upload the more recent 0.83/0.831 version of OB on the mirror (http://mirror.etlegacy.com/omnibot/).
The Windows and Linux installers require these files, and this issue is also blocking the 2.71rc4 *nix packaging work (among other stuff..).
details.new_value:
It would be great if whoever can do it could upload the more recent 0.83/0.831 version of OB on the mirror (http://mirror.etlegacy.com/omnibot/).
The Windows and Linux installers require these files, and this issue is also blocking the 2.71rc4 *nix packaging work (among other stuff..).

Note: The -latest symlinks should also point to the new versions.

journals.notes: The binaries in the download section already contain Omni-bot 0.83 and I am in the process of making it work with wget etc.

Radegast wrote:
> The binaries in the download section already contain Omni-bot 0.83 and I am in the process of making it work with wget etc.

Just to clarify: Both the current Windows and Linux installer available in etlegacy-tools download the OB binaries from the servers (omnibot-windows-latest.zip and omnibot-linux-latest.tar.gz). I'm not sure what you are referring to with "making it work with wget". Did I miss something here?

subject: update OmniBot files on ETL mirror
description:
It would be great if whoever can do it could upload the more recent 0.83/0.831 version of OB on the mirror (http://mirror.etlegacy.com/omnibot/).
The Windows and Linux installers require these files, and this issue is also blocking the 2.71rc4 *nix packaging work (among other stuff..).

Note: The -latest symlinks should also point to the new versions.
